meanings.definition: Not causing damage or wear by friction.
meanings.sent1: The nonabrasive cloth gently cleaned the delicate surface.
meanings.sent2: She preferred using nonabrasive cleaners on her antique furniture.
meanings.sent3: The nonabrasive sponge was so gentle, it almost felt like a cloud.
meanings.sent4: His words were like a nonabrasive balm on her wounded heart.
meanings.sent5: The nonabrasive touch of the artist brought out the beauty of the painting.

meanings.definition: Not harsh or rough in manner or effect.
meanings.sent1: The nonabrasive feedback helped her improve without feeling discouraged.
meanings.sent2: Her nonabrasive leadership style created a positive work environment.
meanings.sent3: The nonabrasive joke made everyone laugh without offending anyone.
meanings.sent4: His nonabrasive approach to discipline was effective yet gentle.
meanings.sent5: The nonabrasive tone of the music soothed her soul after a long day.
